Text: Rafoo Chakkar (Hindi: रफ़ू चक्कर ) is a 1975 Indian Hindi movie produced by Nadiadwala and directed by Narender Bedi.

Text: Rafoo Chakkar:  The movie was inspired by the American film "Some Like It Hot".
